entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @SethAbramson @TimHannan So the executive knew about covid-19 during the impeachment hearing. Do we know when members of Congress were informed? If he withheld information from congress I would suspect it was to affect the outcome of that vote. WHO KNEW WHAT AND WHEN? @tedlieu @RepSwalwell
